note.p: Scottish-born explorer and farmer. Ran away to sea as a schoolboy. Served in the Mexican War, 1845; on the north-western frontier of the US until 1853. Travelled to Australia and went into mining there and in New Zealand until 1863. Returned to the US and entered government service at Fort Leavenworth. In 1870, went to the Cherokee Nation (Oklahoma) where he married Mary Tiger and began farming and stock-raising.
